item.title: Digital Transformation : A war between IT and Marketing ?
item.description: Usually, the digital transformation is a matter of customer experience: it takes digital for the customer and the digital can generate more revenue whether through direct sales channels or by offering additional value to customers (CRM & omincanal challenges: self-care, online assistance, customer journey, digital in store …). The the formation of the IT - Marketing or CMO - CTO couple thus becomes a necessity for carrying out digital transformation projects.
